string.name: movePieceFromE2ToE4
string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Beweg d\'Figur vu e2 uf e4

string.name: moveKnightToC3
string.comment:
moveKnightToC3
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

string.name: dropARookAtB4
string.comment:
dropARookAtB4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Stell uf b4 en Turm inne (nur bi Crazyhouse)

string.name: readOutOpponentName
string.comment:
readOutOpponentName
Press a button on the keyboard to hear the opponent's name aloud. The feature is most useful for blind players.

resources.string: Lis de Name vum Gägner vor
Wänn die obe zeigti Notazion ungwohnt isch, chann mer da meh drüber lerne:
Es zuesätzlichs \"x\", zum en Schlagzug markiere, isch freiwillig

string.name: bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
string.comment:
bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
Only the Latin character 'o' works.

resources.string: Für Rochiere cha me de Buechstabe \"o\" und au d\'Zahl \"0\" verwände
Wänn beidi Rochade möglich sind, benutz \"Enter\" für d\'Königssite
Grossschribig isch nu bi zweidütige Fäll vu Bedütig, z.B. wänn de \"d - Pur\" chönnt mit de Dame verwächslet werde
Für en \"Voruszug\" (premove) eifach de gwünschti Zug itippe, bevor me dra isch
